DOC.criteria: Main Inclusion Criteria 1 . Histologically cytologically confirm solid tumor , either refractory standard therapy effective standard therapy available 2 . Measurable evaluable disease , define RECIST 1.0 3 . Men woman age ≥ 18 year 4 . ECOG performance status 0 2 5 . Adequate hematological function : Hemoglobin ≥ 9.0 g/dL ; Neutrophils > 1.5 x 109/L ; Platelets ≥ 100 x 109/L 6 . Adequate liver function : Total bilirubin ≤ 1.5 x ULN ; AST/ ALT ≤ 2.5 x ULN 7 . For subject liver metastasis : Total bilirubin ≤ 1.5 x ULN ; AST/ALT ≤ 5 ULN 8 . Adequate renal function : Serum creatinine < 1.5 x ULN , and/or Calculated creatinine clearance > 60 mL/min 9 . Resolution acute chemotherapy , radiotherapy surgeryrelated AEs Grade ≤1 , except alopecia 10 . Recovery surgical intervention 11 .
